topic.title: HP Helion 1.1 Development Platform: Quick Start Developer Trial

body.p: Note: The installation procedure has changed significantly from Helion Development Platform v1.0.

The Quick Start Developer Trial is the fastest way to evaluate the HP Helion Development Platform for yourself. Download the files, create and configure your sandbox environment, and deploy one or more sample applications. We provide several sample applications to help you get started quickly, but you may also use your own.
To ensure your success, complete the installation steps in the order they are listed below.
You can also download the entire instruction set in a printable format.

row.entry: 1. Register for your free Helion Public Cloud Account

p.p: 2. Download and install the configuration tool (cf-mgmt)

entry.b: Register for Your Public Cloud Account
entry.p: Register for a Helion Public Cloud account.
Keep your username and password handy as you will be asked for them during installation.

ul.li: A Cloud Credit to help cover hosting costs for your sandbox environment
Access to the Helion Development Platform download repositories

entry.p: Note: Ensure that you review HP Public Cloud pricing to understand what charges may be incurred if the use limits of the free credit offer are exceeded.
